snippet: Sean Couturier and Claude Giroux each scored three goals and Philadelphia rallied for a wild victory over Pittsburgh in Game 2 of their Eastern Conference quarterfinal series.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Philadelphia Flyers rally for a 8-5 victory over the Pittsburgh Penguins, taking a 2-0 lead in their playoff series; other NHL scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Sean Couturier and Claude Giroux each scored three goals and Philadelphia rallied for a wild victory over Pittsburgh in Game 2 of their Eastern Conference quarterfinal series.

headline.seo: Flyers Rally Past Penguins to Take 2-0 Series Lead
headline.main: Flyers Rally Past Penguins to Take 2-0 Series Lead
headline.print_headline: Flyers Rally Past Penguins To Take 2-0 Series Lead
